pages.text: Elementally attuned herbs can be picky about where - as fickle as the elements themselves. Elemental soil itself increases the rate at which any plant grows, but it can also be imbued with an element to allow the corresponding plant to grow.
$(l:herbs/infernal_bulb)Infernal Bulbs$() grow on magmatic soil.$(br2)Obtained by dropping a piece of elemental soil into a pool of lava. The intense heats make this process instant.
$(l:herbs/dewgonia)Dewgonia$() grow on aquatic soil.$(br2)Obtained by soaking elemental soil for a short period of time in water.
$(l:herbs/cloud_berry)Cloud Berries$() grow on caelic, air-bound soil.$(br2)Obtained by exposing elemental soil to the airy heights and the open sky for a period of time.
$(l:herbs/stalicripe)Stalicripe$() grow on terran soil.$(br2)Obtained by exposing elemental soil to the dark, covered depths of underground caves and chasms.
